Subject: Re: The minion and Zardus / Message to Zardus / Halucigen

Halucigen saw the typed message scroll across his optics. ' What, 
is this.  I have never fought under anybody besides the Destrons, 
and if my memory serves me correctly, which I am doubting, that is 
all I ever fought for.  But, if this will give me my revenge on hte 
Destrons, then welcome home dark one' he thought evilly to 
himself.
